A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Critics got this one over the fans. I don't get what all the complains are about. I'm a Star Wars fan who completely enjoyed the movie. Just expected better fight scenes\, but there are a few I can't forget about. Story of Luke Skywalker and the focus on new characters are well done. It's just excitement all around. I'm just looking forward to watch it again and  you get a new dimension to Kylo Ren's character\, and it was quite remarkable.
